TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WebEventProvider extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase
Public MustInherit Class WebEventProvider Inherits ProviderBase

summary.span: 为非缓冲事件提供程序提供基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for non buffered event providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，用于管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。The namespace contains the health event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在管理运行状况事件期间帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 如果你想要自定义运行状况事件处理，可以从派生类，以创建你自己的自定义提供程序。If you want to customize the health-event processing, you can derive from the class to create your own custom provider. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，你将是一种能够使用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，因为实现，并且将通过指定中的值控制运行状况监视系统`healthMonitoring`配置节。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 你还可以从要创建你自己的自定义事件和提供程序的运行状况监视类型派生。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关示例的派生自类，请参阅本主题中提供的示例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生类创建自定义提供程序，可将预先配置的事件写入到本地文件必须为其授予适当访问权限。The following code example shows how to derive from the class to create a custom provider that writes the configured events to a local file for which appropriate access rights must be granted. 此自定义提供程序示例很简单，其主要目的是让你作为开发人员完全控制对其基本机制。This custom provider example is simple and its main intent is to give you as developer full control of its basic mechanisms. 在实际方案中，你可以使用此提供程序和尤其是缓冲的示例提供程序在，作为初步了解应用程序的行为。In a real-world scenario, you could use this provider and especially the example buffered provider available at , as a preliminary probe into the behavior of an application. 这可以帮助你了解的信息可用，则在设计阶段然后稍后你可以将此信息来更复杂的提供程序。This can help you during the design stage to gain an understanding of the information available; then later you can direct this information to a more complex provider. 下面的配置文件的摘录部分演示`healthMonitoring`使 ASP.NET 可以使用上面定义来处理所有的运行状况监视事件的自定义提供程序的部分配置。The following configuration file excerpt shows a `healthMonitoring` section configuration that enables ASP.NET to use the custom provider defined above to process all health-monitoring events. ``` ``` [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/CS/webeventprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/VB/webeventprovider.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它由 ASP.NET 进行调用。It is called by ASP.NET. 你可以调用构造函数从派生时类。You can call the constructor when deriving from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在自定义事件提供程序中使用此构造函数。The following code example shows how to use this constructor in a custom event provider. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/CS/webeventprovider.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/VB/webeventprovider.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Flush() cil managed

summary.span: 将事件从提供程序缓冲区移到事件日志中。

span.span: Moves the events from the provider's buffer into the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调用此方法时，缓冲区中的事件都将立刻移从缓冲区到事件日志，而无论多少时间已经过去所有最后一次写入或多少事件是缓冲区中。When this method is called, all the events in the buffer are immediately moved from the buffer to the event log, regardless of how much time has elapsed since last write or how many events are in the buffer. 最后一次写入时将重置为刷新操作的时间。The time of the last write is reset to the time of the flushing action. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/CS/webeventprovider.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/VB/webeventprovider.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ProcessEvent(class System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent raisedEvent) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub ProcessEvent (raisedEvent As WebBaseEvent)

summary.span: 处理传递给提供程序的事件。

span.span: Processes the event passed to the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是，ASP.NET 运行状况监视对调用开始处理事件的方法。This is the method that ASP.NET health monitoring calls to start processing the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现 方法。The following code example shows how to implement the method. 此方法追加到特定的日志文件的自定义的字符串表示形式的事件。This method appends the customized string representation of the event to a specific log file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/CS/webeventprovider.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/VB/webeventprovider.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Shutdown() cil managed

summary.span: 执行与关闭提供程序相关联的任务。

span.span: Performs tasks associated with shutting down the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 调用方法时托管 Web 应用程序的应用程序域终止。ASP.NET calls the method when the application domain hosting the Web application terminates. 该方法调用以执行将允许应用程序，如关闭资源正常，结束的任务。The method is called to perform tasks that will allow the application to end gracefully, such as closing resources. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/CS/webeventprovider.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/VB/webeventprovider.vb#4)]
